isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - ASSEMBLE - REMOTE CONTROL ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Clean the threads of the set screws with Loctite Safety Solvent or equivalent. Make sure all dirt is removed from the threads.
Apply Loctite #242 or equivalent to the threads of the set screws.
Lubricate the bushings with a multi-purpose lithium grease.
Install the adjusting rod assembly in the housing. Tighten the socket to 47 to 68 Nm (35 to 50 ft-lbs.).
Use a suitable tool to install the bushings.
Fill the area between the bushings with multi-purpose lithium grease.
Put the inner shift lever in position in the housing. Install the shaft in the lever. Install and tighten the set screw to 43 to 54 Nm (32 to 40 ft-lbs.). Install the lockwire.
Install the boot over the shaft and on the housing. Install new tie straps.
Put the outer shift lever on the shaft. Make sure the outer shift lever is aligned with the inner shaft lever. Install and tighten the set screw to 43 to 54 Nm (32 to 40 ft-lbs.) ( Figure 290).

figure.caption: Figure 290. Align Shift Lever to Shaft
